title: water budget information for temperature, water year type, evapotranspiration, 404:417, 514:524, and land use
Projected water budget information for population, population growth

The Department shall provide the California Central Valley Groundwater-Surface Water 068:069, Simulation Model (C2VSIM) and the Integrated Water Flow Model (IWFM) for use by 404:417, Agencies in developing the water budget. Each Agency may choose to use a different 514:524, 527:531 groundwater and surface water model, pursuant to Section 352.4. Note: Authority cited: Section 10733.2, Water Code
